attributes.action: No fixed age to stop driving or modify licence specification.
attributes.additional_details:
That there be no age limit on driving, nor the categories of driving and that whilst all should have a free medical if in receipt of a pension and the new licences should be issued free of charge.

Detail:- doctors to sign and stamp a paper suplement yearly, and card licence replaced every 5 years.

  I am currently 65, and ride a large motorcycle, I know a lady of almost 80 that drives to Spain regularly.
